HowtoHelp will tell you what you can do right now to combat the issue. All of these opportunities can be completed within minutes. You can navigate betweeen opportunities by swiping (just like you\'re doing right now)
Press an opportunity\’s button to complete it in your web browser

That’s it! You’re good to go.

Does HowtoHelp have a political stance?

HowtoHelp is not a political app. We hope that users of all ideologies can enjoy HowtoHelp. However, it should be noted that we accept Amnesty International’s definition of human rights. Included among these rights are same-sex marriage and access to abortion services. Our suggestions for articles relating to LGBTQ issues or abortion reflect this.
